item.title: Curriculum
item.description: My Story My journey began when I started coding in C at the age of 12 to create my own game. At that time, the lack of a structured methodology forced me to learn through trial and error, motivating me to overcome challenges to achieve my goals. Years later, I graduated from school with a specialization in mathematics and informatics. However, I decided to further broaden my horizons by studying philosophy.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post very cool stuff here
